nodes.body: Core Needs: BICEPSThere are six core needs researchers find are most important for humans at work. Not all are equally important to everyone. You might find that equity and belonging are most important to you, but choice and status are most important to your employee.¬† Getting to know them and coaching to them is a shortcut to making others feel understood and valued (aka inclusivity).
